title: Market share of selected TV stations in Germany 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different TV Channels on X-axis for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Audience market share.
Out of all 2 groups, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share for TV Channel ZDF and 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share for TV Channel kabel eins.
The maximum Audience market share for Total audience (3 years and older) that was found in TV Channel ZDF was 4.38 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel RTL II.
Averaging all 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years, the TV Channel RTL is the maximum Audience market share and RTL II is the minimum Audience market share.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different TV Channels on X-axis for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Audience market share.

TV Channel ZDF had the maximum Audience market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Total audience (3 years and older). The minimum Audience market share was observed in TV Channel kabel eins for 14-49 years.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different TV Channels on X-axis for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Audience market share.
Out of all 2 groups, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share for TV Channel ZDF and 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share for TV Channel kabel eins.
The maximum Audience market share for Total audience (3 years and older) that was found in TV Channel ZDF was 4.38 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel RTL II.
Averaging all 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years, the TV Channel RTL is the maximum Audience market share and RTL II is the minimum Audience market share.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different TV Channels on X-axis for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Audience market share.

TV Channel ZDF had the maximum Audience market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Total audience (3 years and older). The minimum Audience market share was observed in TV Channel kabel eins for 14-49 years.
Among all the TV Channels, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share in TV Channel ZDF and lowest Audience market share in TV Channel RTL II.
The maximum Audience market share for Total audience (3 years and older) that was found in TV Channel ZDF was 4.38 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel RTL II.

Among the groups, Total audience (3 years and older) had the biggest difference in Audience market share. Where the maximum Audience market share was 4.38 times larger than the minimum Audience market share.
On average, the TV Channel RTL had the highest Audience market share for all 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. Whereas RTL II had the lowest average Audience market share.
